<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Ustalavic Academic](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=71)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Eye of Dread

</column>

You were educated at a famed Ustalavic academy, such as the University of Lepidstadt or the Sincomakti School of Sciences, and received quality instruction in advanced concepts of mathematics, science, and engineering.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) skill, and the [Academia Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Skill Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=841) skill feat.
